original_text: Then Moses sent his father-in-law on his way, and Jethro returned to his own country.
korean_text: 모세가 그의 장인을 보내니 그가 자기 땅으로 가니라

sentences.original_text: Then Moses sent his father-in-law on his way
and Jethro returned to his own country
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이드로는 그 자기 나라로 돌아갔다
